channel.title: Player Updating Help!
channel.description:
Alright. So I am writing a 317 server from scratch, and I need help with how Player Updating. I am done with logins, and have no idea how Player Updating is done. Here are a few of my questions:
[hr]
[b]Q[/b] - What are a few efficient ways to gather all the players that should receive this update, rather than the method Winterlove servers use? [b]Q[/b] - What bytes do I need to send to the players being updated?
I will add more questions as I venture further and further into the updating.
[hr]
If you do not know the answer, or are just going to post nonsense, then please. I beg of you to not post in this thread.
Thanks.

item.title: Player Updating Help!
item.dc:creator: @pauline pauline
item.description:
@pauline wrote:

I Vain I:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,384128.0.html

Thank you, for that thread is very informative.

Read full topic
